description.text:
1. Fix the bug that long-pressing the Boat option to start the renderer as Pojav.
2. Added a prompt for the zink system driver.
3. Allowed customizing the floating ball icon (gif/png) (hidden feature).
4. Updated mod translation information.
5. Added quick navigation to "MC百科."
6. Fix Pojav backend-related bugs (voxel map, low version shaders crash).
7. Optimized controllers loading.
8. Fix some bugs.

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复长按Boat选择渲染器启动为Pojav的bug
2.添加zink系统驱动提示
3.允许自定义悬浮球图标(gif/png)(隐藏功能)
4.更新模组翻译信息
5.添加”MC百科“快速跳转
6.修复Pojav后端相关bug（体素地图、低版本光影闪退）
7.优化按键加载
8.修复一些bug
